channel.title: 2xtango on Simba Tango

item.title: Tango magazines -- preparing for Buenos Aires
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Some of our students are going to Buenos AiresÂ tomorrow. Oh the memories… I made sure they were equipped with the latest editions of El tangauta and B.A. Tango, giving a good overview over the happenings in November and December. They were always hard to get, even if they are given away for free, it could easily take a couple of weeks before we got hold of an issue. Now, they are available online, and one can prepare for the first week at home or on the plane down there.
